## `SetBoxPlotColor`

Sets box color (in box plots) for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetBoxPlotColor(string colorName)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` colorName | The name of the color to use. |
:::
